name: Invazors - srozavnI
description:
Invazors is a reversed tower defense game where instead of protecting a tower from waves of incoming enemie YOU must attack and destroy a tower while more and more defenses get built around it.

Press the button on the bottom left corner to create a UFO

Tell UFOs where to go at intersections by clicking on the arrows

Collect crystals to create more UFOs, collect 10 crystals to upgrade existing ones

Upgraded UFOs will shoot nearby towers, shoot down the enemy's crystal deposit to win

Controls:

 - WASD or Arrow Keys: move camera

- Left mouse button: click on stuff
